sn45.15:4.2: “Mendicants, these eight things don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.
sn45.15:4.5: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.15:4.7: These are the eight things that don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”
